name: 咬咬

effect.description: The user bites the target with sharp fangs. It may cause the target to flinch, skipping their turn.

skillVisualPrompt: A pair of large, white, jagged pixelated fangs snapping together vertically in the center of a pure #00FF00 green screen.
sfxPrompt: Short, sharp 8-bit crunch sound followed by a low-frequency percussive snap.
